The term '''''Adar''''' may refer to:

== Middle-earth ==
* '''''[[adar]]''''', the [[Sindarin]] word for "father".

== Adaptations ==
* '''[[Adar (episode)]]''', the third episode of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]'', a television adaptation published by [[Amazon Studios]]
* '''[[Adar (The Rings of Power)]]''', the leader of the Orcs within ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]''
